K12mpratpru:3: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān vajrameruśikharakuṭāgāre viharati sma /
K12mpratpru:14: sarvair ekajātibhir avaivartikair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau mahāsthāmaprāptair mahāvajravimokṣasamādhibuddhakṣetravikurvaṇamahāprātihāryasaṃdarśakaiḥ
K12mpratpru:31: evaṃ pramukhair bodhisatvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃbahulaiś ca mahāśrāvakaiḥ sarvair arhadbhir kṣīṇāsravair ucchinnabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ
K12mpratpru:48: evaṃ pramukhaiḥ saṃbahulair mahāśrāvakaiḥ sārdhaṃ maheśvaradevaputrapramukhaiś cāsaṃkhyeyair aparimāṇair anabhilāṣyānabhilāṣyaiḥ śuddhāvāsakayikair devaputraiḥ //
K12mpratpru:88: saptabhiś ca mahārākṣasībhiḥ saptabhiś ca maharṣivaraiḥ /
K12mpratpru:92: bhūtaiś ca vighnaiś ca vināyakaiś ca pretabhūtamaharddhikaiḥ /
K12mpratpru:96: virūḍhakena ca virūpākṣeṇa ca daṇḍapāṇinā ca /
K12mpratpru:103: dantakena ca dāmakena ca lohakena ca mohakena ca /
K12mpratpru:108: ṣaṣṭyā ca koṭagiryā ca catasṛbhiś ca bhaginībhiḥ sabhrātṛkābhiḥ //
K12mpratpru:125: ity api ca bhagavān supravartitadharmacakraḥ supariniṣṭhitabuddhakāryaḥ suparipūrṇapuṇyajñānasaṃbhāraḥ
K12mpratpru:140: kāñcanaparvatarāja iva śriyā jvalanasūryasahasrābhir ekaprabhāmaṇḍalavirājita bhūmibhāgaḥ /
K12mpratpru:141: suparipūrṇacandramaṇḍala iva sarvalokapriyadarśano mahākalpavṛkṣa iva buddhadharmaiḥ saṃkusumito dharmaṃ deśayati sma //
K12mpratpru:142: ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati sma //
K12mpratpru:143: atha khalu bhagavān mūrdhna ūrṇakeśāt sarvabuddhasaṃdarśanaṃ nāma raśmijālaṃ pramuñcati sma /
K12mpratpru:146: yāvanti ca gaṅgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi tāni ca sarvāṇi tenāvabhāsena sphuṭīkṛtāny avabhāsitāny abhūvan /
K12mpratpru:147: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhā bhagavanto 'nekasiṃhāsanakoṭīniyutaśatasahasravyūhakūṭāgāravimāneṣu dharmaṃ darśayati sma /
K12mpratpru:149: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tāṃ vistīrṇāṃ pariṣadām āmantrayate sma //
K12mpratpru:157: aḍakavatīṃ tathā gacched yakṣāṇām ālayaṃ bhuvi /
K12mpratpru:163: te sarve stambhitā bhonti pratisarāyās tu tejasā /
K12mpratpru:164: paracakrā vinaśyanti kākhordā ye ca dāruṇāḥ //
K12mpratpru:165: mantrakarmā na bādhante mūlakarmāc ca mucyate /
K12mpratpru:166: na viṣaṃ na garaṃ nāgnir na śastraṃ naiva codakam //
K12mpratpru:167: aśanir vidyutaś caiva kālavāyur na bādhate /
K12mpratpru:169: upasargā vinaśyanti vyādhayo na bhavanty api /
K12mpratpru:170: sarve 'rthās tasya sidhyanti jayaṃ prāpnoti nityaśaḥ //
K12mpratpru:171: yaḥ kaścid dhārayed vidyāṃ kaṇṭhe bāhau ca nityaśaḥ /
K12mpratpru:172: tasya sarvāṇi kāryāṇi sidhyante nātra saṃśayaḥ //
K12mpratpru:173: nityaṃ rakṣanti devendrā nāgarājās tathaiva ca /
K12mpratpru:177: vajrapāṇiś ca yakṣendro rājānaś caturas tathā /
K12mpratpru:178: tasya rakṣāṃ kariṣyanti divā rātrau na saṃśayaḥ //
K12mpratpru:179: śakraś ca trideśaiḥ sārdhaṃ brahmā viṣṇur maheśvarāḥ /
K12mpratpru:182: ṛṣayaś ca mahātejā devāś caiva maharddhikāḥ //
K12mpratpru:188: mahākālī ca dūtyaś ca vajradūtyas tathāparāḥ //
K12mpratpru:192: tathā dhanyā mahābhāgā padmakuṇḍalir eva ca //
K12mpratpru:198: tasya rakṣāṃ kariṣyanti yasya vidyā kare sthitā //
K12mpratpru:200: śrīdevī sarasvatī caiva taṃ rakṣanti sadānugāḥ //
K12mpratpru:201: mahāpratisarām etāṃ yā strī dhārayate sadā /
K12mpratpru:203: sukhaṃ garbhāṇi vardhante sukhaṃ prasūyati gurviṇī /
K12mpratpru:204: vyādhayaś cāpi naśyanti sarvapāpā na saṃśayaḥ //
K12mpratpru:207: śucir dvārayate yas tu striyo vā puruṣo 'tha vā /
K12mpratpru:211: nityaṃ ca jvalate lakṣmyā puṇyarāśir vivardhate /
K12mpratpru:215: kilbiṣāś caiva naśyanti pratyamitrās tathaiva ca /
K12mpratpru:217: sarvakāmaṃgamā hy eṣā bhāvayed yas tu nityaśaḥ /
K12mpratpru:218: tad idānīṃ pravakṣāmi bhūtasaṃghā śṛṇontu me //
K12mpratpru:232: gagariṇi 2 giri 2 giriṇi 2 gamari 2 gaha 2 gargāri 2 gagari 2 gaṃbhari 2 gabhi 2 gahi 2 gamani 2 gare 2 guru 2 gubha 2 guha 2 guruṇicale /
K12mpratpru:233: guhaṇi 2 guruṇe 2 culu 2 gucile 2 jaya vijaya 2 /
K12mpratpru:238: rakṣa 2 māṃ sarvasatvān sarvabhayebhyaḥ sarvopadravebhyaḥ sarvavyādhibhyaḥ /
K12mpratpru:242: muri 2 muci 2 muli 2 cili 2 kili 2 mili 2 kamale vimale /
K12mpratpru:248: māṃ saparivāraṃ sarvasatvāṃś ca samantān sarvapāpaviśodhani /
K12mpratpru:249: huru 2 muru 2 rakṣa 2 māṃ sarvasatvāṃś cānāthān atrāṇān aparāyaṇāt primocya sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ caṇḍe 2 caṇḍi 2 caṇḍini 2 vegavati 2 sarvaduṣṭanivāriṇi
K12mpratpru:251: huru 2 muru 2 curu 2 turu 2 āyuḥpālani suravarapramathani /
K12mpratpru:256: dhuru 2 dharaṇidhare dhara 2 sumu 2 musu 2 rurucale cālaya sarvaduṣṭān pūraya me sarvapāpaviśuddhe āśāṃ śrīvasudhare jayakamale /
K12mpratpru:259: śodhaya 2 śuddhe 2 bhara 2 bhiri 2 bhuru 2 maṅgalaviśuddhe /
K12mpratpru:267: oṃ hrītraṃ tara 2 tāraya 2 māṃ sarvasatvāṃś ca nāgavilokite /
K12mpratpru:268: lahu 2 hulu 2 hutu 2 turu 2 kiṇi 2 kṣiṇi 2 huni 2 sarvagrahabhakṣaṇi /
K12mpratpru:269: piṅgale 2 muru 2 mucu 2 musu 2 musuri rate /
K12mpratpru:276: varṣantu devaḥ samantena divyodakena amṛtavarṣaṇi devatāvatāraṇi /
K12mpratpru:277: abhiṣiñcantu māṃ sugatavaravacanāmṛtavaravapuṣe rakṣa 2 māṃ sarvatra sarvadā /
K12mpratpru:281: jaya 2 vijaya 2 jayatu sarvatra sarvakālaṃ sidhyantu me /
K12mpratpru:282: iyaṃ vidyā sādhaya maṇḍalaṃ ghāṭaya vighnān /
K12mpratpru:283: jaya 2 siddhe 2 sidhya 2 budhya 2 pūraya 2 pūraṇi 2 pūraya me āśāṃ sarvavidyodgatamūrte /
K12mpratpru:285: tiṣṭha 2 bhagavati samayam anupālaya sarvatathāgatahṛdayaśuddhe vyavalokaya māṃ saparivāraṃ sarvasatvāṃś (Mp_9)
K12mpratpru:286: cātha mahādāruṇabhayeṣu sarvāsāṃ paripūraya trāyasva mahābhayebhyaḥ /
K12mpratpru:347: ye mahāhitaiṣiṇas teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ śarīraṃ jvālaya 2 duṣṭacittānāṃ svāhā //
K12mpratpru:418: oṃ sarvatathāgatamūrte pravaravigatabhaye śamayasva me bhagavati sarvapāpaṃ svastir mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca svāhā //
K12mpratpru:419: oṃ muni 2 vimuni 2 dhari cari calane bhayavigate bhayahariṇi /
K12mpratpru:421: oṃ muni 2 munivare abhisiñcantu māṃ sarvasatvāṃś ca sarvatathāgatāḥ sarvavidyābhiṣekair mahāvajrakavacamudrāmudritaiḥ sarvatathāgatahṛdayādhiṣṭhitavajre svāhā //
K12mpratpru:422: samantajvālāmālāviśuddhisphūritacintāmaṇimahāmūdrāhṛdayāparājitā mahādhāraṇī tena khalu samayena tasyām eva pariṣadi mahābrāhmaṇaḥ saṃnipatito 'bhūt /
K12mpratpru:425: asyā mahāpratisarāyā mahāvidyārājñaḥ sahasravarṇamātreṇa mahābrāhmaṇa tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā sarvapāpavinirmuktir bhavati /
K12mpratpru:430: yadā kapilavastumahānagaravare rāhulabhadraḥ kumāro mātuḥ kukṣigato 'bhūd yadā ṣaḍvarṣātikrānte sarvārthasiddhena kumāreṇa mama nābhiḥ pādaṃ suṣṭhena pṛṣṭho nirgatas tad ājānāmi /
K12mpratpru:433: tadā gopayā śākyakanyayā ātmānam agnikhadāyāṃ prakṣiptaḥ /
K12mpratpru:435: tadā rāhulabhadrakumāro mātuḥ kukṣigato eva imāṃ vidyāṃ manasy akarṣīt /
K12mpratpru:438: tato gopāyāḥ śākyakanyāyāḥ śarīram agninā na spṛṣṭam /
K12mpratpru:439: tat kasya hetor eṣā vidyā sarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhitā /
K12mpratpru:441: na ca viṣeṇa śakyaṃ taṃ jīvitād vyaparopayitum /
K12mpratpru:443: yadā mahābrāhmaṇa śūrpārake mahānagaravare koṣavaṇikasya śreṣṭhinaḥ putro vidyāvādiko babhūva /
K12mpratpru:444: tena tad vidyābalena takṣako nāgarājā ākarṣitaḥ /
K12mpratpru:445: ākarṣayitvā ca pramāṇavaśād baddho nadānto yāvat tenāsau krodhād daṣṭaḥ /
K12mpratpru:446: sa tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayati /
K12mpratpru:447: yathā jānāmi ca me jīvitaṃ niruddham iti /
K12mpratpru:449: na ca kaścic chaknoti viṣaṃ cikitsitum /
K12mpratpru:450: atha traiva śūrpārake mahānagaravare vimalaviśuddhir nāmopāsikā prativasati sma /
K12mpratpru:452: sā tasyāntikam upasaṃkrāntā upasaṃkramyemāṃ mahāvidyāṃ pravartayāmāsa /
K12mpratpru:453: sā tayaikavelāyām anusmṛtamātrayā nirviṣaṃ smṛtipratilabdhaṃ kṛtvā tato mahāvyasanāt parimocayitvā imām eva śuddhiputre mahāvidyāṃ hṛdayagatāṃ kārayati sma /
K12mpratpru:455: api ca mahābrāhmaṇa kiṃ parijñātam iti /
K12mpratpru:456: bārāṇāsyāṃ mahānagaryām anupūrveṇānuvicaramāṇo rājā brahmadatta iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
K12mpratpru:457: tasya prātisīmiko balacakrarājā caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnāhya bārāṇasīmahānagarīṃ parivārya vināśayitum ārabdhaḥ /
K12mpratpru:460: tataḥ kiṃ tu khalu vayam upāyaṃ kuryāmo yenaitat paracakraṃ vinaśyet /
K12mpratpru:468: kim idaṃ mahārāja nāsmābhiḥ kadācid api na śrutam iti /
K12mpratpru:472: nānāgandhodakena snātaḥ śirāḥ śucivastraṃ prāvṛtya imāṃ mahāpratisarāṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ
K12mpratpru:473: yathāvidhinābhilikhya śiraḥ keśe 'vasthāpya imām eva mahāvidyārājñīṃ kavacaṃ kṛtvā
K12mpratpru:475: āmarditaś ca tāvad yāvac caraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K12mpratpru:477: evaṃ hi mahābrāhmaṇa pratyakṣaṃ mahānubhāveyaṃ mahāvidyārājñī sarvatathāgatahṛdayamudrādhiṣṭhitā /
K12mpratpru:480: ye kecit paścime kāle paścime samaye alpāyuṣkānāṃ mandabhāgyānāṃ mandadhānyānaṃ parīttabhāgyānāṃ satvānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya draṣṭavyā /
K12mpratpru:481: yaḥ kaścin mahābrāhmaṇa imāṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ yathāvidhinā likhitvā bāhau kaṇṭhe dhārayiṣyati /
K12mpratpru:492: kim iti pūrvaṃ parijñātaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa anyatamasmiṃ pṛthivīpradeśe bhikṣuśrāddhas
K12mpratpru:494: gaṇaprāptaṃ ca yad dravyaṃ tat paudgalikaṃ kṛtvā sarvam adhiṣṭhāya takṣayati /
K12mpratpru:498: atha tasminn eva pṛthivīpradeśe upāsako brāhmaṇo prativasati /
K12mpratpru:500: śrutvā ca punar yena sa bhikṣus tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya tasya bhikṣor imāṃ mahāpratisarāṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ likhitvā kaṇṭhe badhnāti sma
K12mpratpru:501: samanantarabaddhāyāṃ mahāpratisarāyāṃ mahāvidyārājñyāṃ tasya bhikṣoḥ sarvā vedanāḥ (Mp_14)
K12mpratpru:502: praśāntāḥ sarvavyādhibhyaḥ parimuktaḥ svasthaḥ saṃvṛtta iti /
K12mpratpru:503: tasyām eva rātryām atyayābhyupasthite smṛtipratilabdhaḥ kālagataḥ /
K12mpratpru:504: tasminn eva kṣatravare utsṛṣṭo 'vīcau mahānarake upapannaḥ /
K12mpratpru:505: tac ca tasya mṛtaśarīraṃ bhikṣubhiḥ kūṭe sthāpitam /
K12mpratpru:506: sā ca tasya mahāpratisarā mahāvidyārājñī kaṇṭhe baddhaivāsthitā /
K12mpratpru:507: samanantaropapannasya tasya bhikṣos tasminn avīcau mahānarake teṣāṃ nārakānāṃ satvānāṃ sarvaduḥkhavedanāḥ śāntāḥ /
K12mpratpru:509: ye ca te mahānta-āvicikā-agniskandhās te 'pi sarveṇa sarvam upaśāntā iti /
K12mpratpru:510: atha te yamapuruṣā vismayam āpannā yamasya dharmarājasyemaṃ niścayaṃ vistareṇārocayati sma //
K12mpratpru:512: praśāntā dāruṇā duḥkhāḥ satvānāṃ karmajāś ca ye /
K12mpratpru:514: karapattrā na bādhante kṣuradhārā na sajjate /
K12mpratpru:516: asipattrāvane pattrā na bādhante karmajā punaḥ /
K12mpratpru:517: yamas tvaṃ dharmarājo 'si dharmeṇa śāsayase prajām //
K12mpratpru:518: idaṃ tu kāraṇaṃ nālpam asmākaṃ vaktum arhasi /
K12mpratpru:521: kim etat kathyatāṃ śīghraṃ kathaṃ tv iti vaco 'vadat //
K12mpratpru:525: avīcir yasya nāmedaṃ tenāsau narakasaṃkaṭa ucyate //
K12mpratpru:526: karmāṇaṃ yasya vaicitryaṃ satvā ye hi sukhīkṛtam /
K12mpratpru:527: sukhino hy eva sarvatra punar yānti surālayam //
K12mpratpru:528: yamo 'pi dharmarājā vai dṛṣṭvā vadati vismitaḥ /
K12mpratpru:529: maharddhiko 'yaṃ mahac cāsya śarīraṃ pūrvo janmikam //
K12mpratpru:530: yathā dhātuśatair vṛndaṃ stūpaṃ śobhati śāśvatam /
K12mpratpru:532: atha te narakapālā yakṣā yamasya dharmarājasya idaṃ vacanam abruvan /
K12mpratpru:535: pratipat smārayed yas tu sa na gacchati durgatiṃ sugatiṃ gacchate cāsau pratisarābhāvabhāvitaḥ /
K12mpratpru:539: atha te yakṣā yamapuruṣā tasyām eva rātryāṃ puṣkarāvatīṃ gatāḥ /
K12mpratpru:545: yāvat tasya ca tair yakṣaiḥ pratisarākūṭeti nāma sthāpitam //
K12mpratpru:546: atha te yakṣā punar āgatya yamasya dharmarājasyemaṃ niścayaṃ vistareṇārocayati sma /
K12mpratpru:548: samanantarodite tasmin vacanaparyavasāne mahāsatvas taṃ nārakaṃ śarīraṃ vijahya trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ /
K12mpratpru:550: tena hi mahābrāhmaṇa parijñātavatī pūrvatas tasmād eveyaṃ mahāpratisarā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā likhitavyā yathāvidhinā nityaṃ śarīragatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayitavyā /
K12mpratpru:555: pūrvaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa hiṅgumardane mahānagare vimalaśaṅkho nāma śreṣṭhī mahādhanakanakasamṛddhaḥ paripūrṇakośakośāgārasaṃpanno babhūva /
K12mpratpru:557: atha sa mahāsārthavāho yānapātram āsādya mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /
K12mpratpru:558: (Mp_16) yāvat timiṅgilaiḥ so 'sya poto 'vastabdhaḥ vināśayitukāmā nāgāś ca saṃkṣubdhā mahāntagarjanā sphoṭaṃ kurvanti /
K12mpratpru:560: tatas te vaṇijo mahatā duḥkhenābhyāhatacittās taṃ mahāntaṃ nāgasaṃkṣobhaṃ vidyudulkāṃ
K12mpratpru:561: vajrāśaniṃ cotsṛjanti taiś ca timiṅgilaiḥ potam avastabdhaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahāntaṃ utkrośanaṃ
K12mpratpru:564: tatas te sārthavāhasyopagamya karuṇam idaṃ vacanam abruvan /
K12mpratpru:566: atha khalu mahāsārthavāho dṛḍhacitto mahāmatiḥ vaṇijo viklavībhūtān idaṃ vacanam abruvat /
K12mpratpru:567: mā bhair mā bhair vaṇijo bhavanto vīratāṃ vrajata /
K12mpratpru:569: tata vīramānaso bhūtā vaṇija idaṃ vacanam abruvan /
K12mpratpru:570: kim etat tena mahāsatva brūhi śīghram avighnataḥ /
K12mpratpru:571: yāvad jīvitam asmākaṃ tvat prabhāvād mahāmate kathyatāṃ jñānamahātmyaṃ paścāt kiṃ kariṣyasi /
K12mpratpru:572: tataḥ sārthapatis teṣām imāṃ vidyām udāharat /
K12mpratpru:573: asti mama mahāvidyā pratisarā nāma viśrutā //
K12mpratpru:576: tataḥ mahāsārthavāhas tasyāṃ velāyām imāṃ mahāpratisarāṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ likhitvā dhvajāgrāvaropitāṃ karoti sma /
K12mpratpru:577: samanantaraṃ dhvajāgrāvaropitāyām asyāṃ mahāpratisarāyāṃ mahāvidyārājñyāṃ sarva eva te timiṅgilās taṃ potam ekajvālībhūtaṃ paśyanti /
K12mpratpru:578: tatas te nāgā maitramanasas teṣām antike 'vatīrya pūjāṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ /
K12mpratpru:579: te ca timiṅgilā asyā mahāpratisarāyā mahāvidyārājñyā anubhāvena dahyamānāḥ /
K12mpratpru:581: sārthikās tair mahānāgair mahati mahāratnadvīpe prāpitā iti //
K12mpratpru:582: jñātavatīyaṃ mahāvidyā mahāpratisarā sarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhitā tena hetunā mahābrāhmaṇa mahāvidyeti khyātā /
K12mpratpru:596: ye ca tasmin viṣaye mahānāgās te samyag eva kālena kālaṃ varṣadhārām utsṛjanti /
K12mpratpru:597: yasmin viṣaye iyaṃ vidyārājñī mahāpratisarā nāma pracariṣyati /
K12mpratpru:598: tatra taiḥ satvair jñātvā pūjāsatkāraṃ kṛtvā nānāgandhair nānāpuṣpair nānāvastraiḥ
K12mpratpru:601: tatas teṣāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ yathā ciñcitam āśāṃ paripūrayiṣyanti /
K12mpratpru:604: putrārthī labhate garbhasaṃdhāraṇī parāḥ sukhena vardhate garbhaḥ sukhenaiva prasūyate /
K12mpratpru:607: ihaiva magadhaviṣaye rājā prasāritapāṇir nāma sa cāputrako 'bhūva /
K12mpratpru:609: tena rājñā jātamātreṇa pāṇiṃ prasārya mātuḥ stanau gṛhītvā yāvad āptaṃ kṣīraṃ pītam /
K12mpratpru:610: tau ca stanau saha sparśamātreṇa suvarṇavarṇau saṃvṛttau /
K12mpratpru:612: tena kāraṇena tasya rājñaḥ prasāritapāṇir iti nāma sthāpitam /
K12mpratpru:613: anyac ca tasya rājñaḥ yācanakajanā āgacchanti /
K12mpratpru:614: tadā sa rājā dakṣiṇapāṇiṃ prasārayaty upary antarikṣe bodhisatvaḥ sa rājā tena hetunā tasya buddhābhiprasannā devatā divyai ratnaviśeṣaiḥ suvarṇamaṇibhiś ca pāṇiṃ paripūrayanti /
K12mpratpru:618: devānāṃ ca mahānti pūjāsatkārāṇi karoti putrahetor na ca putraṃ pratilabhate /
K12mpratpru:619: sa paurāṇāṃ tathāgatacaityānāṃ purataḥ pūjāsatkāraṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ /
K12mpratpru:620: mahānti ca pūjāsatkārāṇi karoti dānāni ca dadāti /
K12mpratpru:624: tat kasya hetor bhūtapūrvaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa asminn eva magadhaviṣaye mallā nāma janapade
K12mpratpru:625: kuśinagare mahāpaṭṭanavare bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasya śāsane samutpanno
K12mpratpru:626: dharmacittakaḥ kaścid mahāsatvo dharmamatir nāma śreṣṭhī prativasati /
K12mpratpru:627: sa sarvasatvānām antike mahākaruṇācittam upasthāpya imām eva mahāvidyāṃ mahāpratisarām ārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
K12mpratpru:628: atha kaścid eko daridrapuruṣas taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā tasya śreṣṭhina idaṃ vacanam abruvat /
K12mpratpru:629: aham āryasya niveśane bhṛtikarmaṃ kariṣyāmi dharmaṃ ca śroṣyāmi /
K12mpratpru:630: yadā mama kiṃcid bhaviṣyati tadāhaṃ dharmaṃ pūjayiṣyāmi /
K12mpratpru:631: tasya gṛhavyāpāraṃ kurvato dharmaṃ ca śṛṇvato yāvad apareṇa kālasamayena śreṣṭhinā eko dīnāro dattaḥ /
K12mpratpru:632: sa tena sarvasatvaparitrāṇārthaṃ bodhicittam utpādya sādhāṛaṃ kṛtvā mahāpratisarāratneti niryātitā /
K12mpratpru:633: evaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam anena mahāphalena mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca dāridraduḥkhasaṃcchedaḥ syāt /
K12mpratpru:634: anena kāraṇena tad dānaṃ parīkṣayaṃ na gacchati /
K12mpratpru:635: evaṃ bahuvidhānekavidhapuṇyābhisaṃskārakṛto devatāś ca pūjitā yāvad buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūjitās tadā ca śuddhāvāsakāyikābhir devatābhiḥ svapne darśanaṃ dattam /
K12mpratpru:637: mahādhāraṇī mahāvidyārājñī mahāpratisarā nāma taṃ yathāvidhinā kalpenābhihitena upavāsoṣitāyā
K12mpratpru:638: agramahiṣyā devyāḥ śarīre baddhā tatas te putrapratilambho bhaviṣyatīti /
K12mpratpru:639: atha sa rājā prativiśuddhas tasyām eva rātryām atyayena saṃkhyālipinakṣatragrahavipañcakān kulabrāhmaṇān saṃnipātya yathāvidhinā (Mp_19)
K12mpratpru:640: kalpopadiṣṭena puṣye nakṣatrarāje pratipanne susnātagātrāyā upavāsoṣitāyā agramahiṣyā devyā yathāvidhinā likhyemāṃ mahāpratisarāṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ kaṇṭhe baddhavān /
K12mpratpru:641: mahatīṃ mahābuddhacaityeṣu pūjām akarṣīd anekāni ca ratnaviśeṣāṇi satvānāṃ dānāni dattāni /
K12mpratpru:642: tato navānāṃ māsānām abhyayāt putro jāto 'bhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ /
K12mpratpru:644: tato jñātvā mahābrāhmaṇa sarvakāmaṃgamā aparājitā mahāpratisarāratneti viśrutā mahāvidyārājñī sarvatathāgatapujitā śakrasyāpīyaṃ cūḍāmaṇiḥ sarvathā
K12mpratpru:645: yadā śakro devānām indro mahāsaṃgrāmam asuraiḥ sārdhaṃ kartukāmas tadā imāṃ mahāvidyāṃ
K12mpratpru:646: kavacaṃ kṛtvā saṃgrāmamadhye 'vatīrya cūḍāyām avasthāpya sarvāsurān nirjitya sukhaṃ
K12mpratpru:649: evaṃ hi mahābrāhmaṇa prathamacittotpādam upādāya boddhisatvasya mahāsatvasyemāṃ mahāpratisarāṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ dhārayataḥ sarvamārair anavamṛdyatā bhavati /
K12mpratpru:650: yasyaiṣā kaṇṭhagatā bhaviṣyati sa sarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhito bhaviṣyati /
K12mpratpru:652: sarvadevamanuṣyāmanuṣyarājarājāmātyabrāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiś ca satatasamitaṃ vanditaḥ pūjitaḥ saṃmānito bhaviṣyati /
K12mpratpru:659: imāni cānena catvāry aparājitāmahāvidyāmantrapadahṛdayāni satatasamitaṃ likhitvā kāyakaṇṭhagatāni kṛtvā dhārayitavyāni /
K12mpratpru:664: tadyathā / oṃ amṛtavare vara vara pravara viśuddhe hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā //
K12mpratpru:665: oṃ amṛtavilokini garbhasaṃrakṣaṇi ākarṣaṇi hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā //
K12mpratpru:667: oṃ vimale vipule jaya vare amṛte hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā //
K12mpratpru:668: oṃ bhara bhara saṃbhara saṃbhara indriyabalaviśodhane hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā //
K12mpratpru:669: oṃ maṇidhari vajriṇi mahāpratisare hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā //
K12mpratpru:671: aśeṣaiḥ sarvabuddhair bodhisatvaiś ca śrāvakair ekasvarasaṃnipātena ekasvaranirghoṣeṇa
K12mpratpru:674: atidullabham apy eṣāṃ śravaṇaṃ kiṃ punaḥ likhanapaṭhanadhāraṇavācanaparadeśanā buddhakṛtyam etad iti jñātavyā /
K12mpratpru:676: sarvatathāgataiḥ praśaṃsitā anumoditā vyākṛtā paramadullabheyaṃ mahādhāraṇī aparājitā mahāpratisarā nāmadheyaṃ śravaṇam api paramadullabham
K12mpratpru:683: mahādhāraṇī yāvad buddhabodhiparipūrayitrīyaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa mahāpratisarā mahāvidyārājñī
K12mpratpru:684: na kvacit pratijanyate sarvatra mahāpūjāṃ prāpnoti yathāhaṃ śāstā jitaviṣayaḥ /
K12mpratpru:688: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yena bodhimaṇḍalas tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya sarvabuddhapraśastaṃ
K12mpratpru:689: dharmacakraṃ pravartayitukāmas tadā tasya bhagavataḥ sarvamāraiḥ saparivārair anekamārakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparivṛtair
K12mpratpru:691: nānāpraharaṇavṛṣṭībhir abhinirmāyāgatya caturdiśaṃ parivāryāntarāyaḥ kartum ārabdhaḥ /
K12mpratpru:693: muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīm āsthāya imāṃ mahāpratisarāṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ manasā saptakṛtvaḥ pravartayāmāsa /
K12mpratpru:694: samanantaraṃ pravartayitāyām asyāṃ mahāpratisarāyāṃ mahāvidyārājñyāṃ tatkṣaṇād eva
K12mpratpru:695: sarve te mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso dadṛśur bhagavata ekaikasmād romakūpavivarād anekakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
K12mpratpru:698: gṛhṇata 2 bandhata 2 duṣṭamārān vidhvaṃsaya duṣṭacittān vicūrṇaya jīvitaṃ sarvaduṣṭagrahavighnavināyakānāṃ ye bhagavato viheṭhanaṃ kurvanti
K12mpratpru:699: tatas te sarvaduṣṭamārāmaitrīkhaṅgeṇābhinirjitāṃ kṛtvā kecic chikṣāpadāni grāhitā /
K12mpratpru:700: kecid yāvad anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtās tatra mahānubhāvāḥ /
K12mpratpru:701: anye punas tān tathāgataromavivaravinirgatān mahāpuruṣān dṛṣṭvā tasmin nagare vihvalībhūtā ṛddhiparihīṇā naṣṭapratibhānabalaparākramā vidhvastāḥ
K12mpratpru:705: sarvavighnavināyakān mārāṃś ca pāpīyāṃso vidhvaṃsayitvottīrṇaḥ pāraṃgata iti /
K12mpratpru:706: evaṃ hi mahābrāhmaṇa mahābalavegarddhipāramitāprāpteyaṃ mahāpratisarā mahāvidyārājñī smaraṇamātreṇa sarvavyasanabhayabhairavebhyaḥ (Mp_22)
K12mpratpru:709: tasmāt tarhi mahābrāhmaṇa nityam evānusmaraṇamātreṇa manasi kartavyā /
K12mpratpru:710: sarvakālaṃ ca likhitvā kāyakaṇṭhagatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayitavyā /
K12mpratpru:712: ujjayanyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ rājño brahmadattasya vihite kenacit puruṣeṇāparādhaḥ kṛtaḥ /
K12mpratpru:715: atha te vadhapuruṣās taṃ rājñājñaptaṃ puruṣaṃ gṛhītvā parvatavivaraṃ nītvā asikośān niṣkāsya taṃ puruṣaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayitum ārabdhaḥ /
K12mpratpru:716: tadā sa puruṣa imāṃ mahāpratisarāṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ manasā smṛtavān likhitāṃ ca dakṣiṇe bāhau baddhvā dhārayati sma /
K12mpratpru:717: tasya mahāsatvasyāsyā mahāvidyāyāḥ prabhāvenāsir ekajvālībhūtā khaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ yathā pāṃśumayo vikīrṇa iti /
K12mpratpru:718: tatas te vadhakapuruṣā imam evaṃ niścayaṃ rājaṃ vistareṇārocayāmāsuḥ /
K12mpratpru:720: gacchata bho puruṣā anyatarasmin pradeśe yakṣaguhāsti /
K12mpratpru:723: tataḥ sa puruṣo vadhakapuruṣais tasyāṃ yakṣaguhāyāṃ choritaḥ /
K12mpratpru:724: samanantara chorite tasmin yakṣaguhāyāṃ tatas te yakṣāḥ sarve tuṣṭamanaso hṛṣṭacittāś ca pradhāvitā mānuṣaṃ bhakṣayiṣyāma iti /
K12mpratpru:725: te paśyanti asyā mahāpratisarāyā mahāvidyārājñyā anubhāvena taṃ puruṣam ekajvalībhūtaṃ dedīpyamānaṃ vigrahaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca sarva eva te yakṣā saṃtrastā dahyamānaṃ svaśarīraṃ paśyanti /
K12mpratpru:726: atha te yakṣā vismayaṃ samāpannās taṃ puruṣaṃ gṛhītvā bahirdvāre 'vasthāpya pradakṣiṇīkartum ārabdhāḥ /
K12mpratpru:727: yāvat tair vadhakapuruṣai rājñe niścayo 'yaṃ vistareṇāroitaḥ /
K12mpratpru:728: tato bhūyo rājā prakupitaś caṇḍībhūtaḥ kathayati /
K12mpratpru:729: yad eva bhavanto gacchatainaṃ puruṣaṃ baddhvā nadyāṃ prakṣipata /
K12mpratpru:730: tataḥ sa puruṣo vadhakapuruṣair baddhvā nadyām prakṣiptaḥ /
K12mpratpru:731: samanantaraṃ prakṣipte tasmin mahāpuruṣe sā nadī nirudakī bhūtā yatha sa (Mp_23)
K12mpratpru:734: rājā śrutvā tato rājā vismitotphullavadanaḥ kathayati /
K12mpratpru:736: kim atra kāraṇaṃ syād iti me vitarkaḥ /
K12mpratpru:737: atha sa rājā taṃ puruṣam āhūyainam āha /
K12mpratpru:750: tato rājñā prahṛṣṭamānasena mahāpratisarā mahāvidyārājñī pūjitā mānitābhinanditā /
K12mpratpru:751: tasya puruṣasya poṭṭabandhaṃ kṛtvā svasya janapadasya purastān nagarajyeṣṭhatāyām abhiṣeko dattaḥ /
K12mpratpru:752: evaṃ hi mahābrāhmaṇa iyaṃ mahāpratisarā mahāvidyārājñī sarvatra mahatīpūjāṃ labhate /
K12mpratpru:754: evaṃ hi mahābrāhmaṇa pūrvam iyaṃ mahāpratisarā mahāvidyārājñī na kvacit pratihanyate /
K12mpratpru:755: tasmād avaśyam iyaṃ mahāvidyārājñī kāyakaṇṭhagatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayitavyā /
K12mpratpru:756: api tu mahābrāhmaṇa manukṣetreṇeyaṃ mahāvidyārājñī supraśastena vidhānena likhitavyā //
K12mpratpru:757: atha sa mahābrāhmaṇo 'tīva prahṛṣṭamanasā bhagavantaṃ pañcamaṇḍalakenābhipraṇamya praṣṭum ārabdhaḥ /
K12mpratpru:758: kīdṛśena bhadanta bhagavan vidhāneneyaṃ mahāpratisarā mahāvidyārājñī likhitavyā //
K12mpratpru:760: śṛṇu mahābrāhmaṇa tvām ahaṃ vakṣye sarvasatvānukaṃpayā /
K12mpratpru:761: yena satvāḥ sukhino bhontu mucyatai karmasaṃkaṭāt //
K12mpratpru:773: puṣpadhūpāś ca gandhāś ca dātavyātra mahārihā //
K12mpratpru:774: dhūpanaṃ candanaṃ caiva spṛkkāguru tathaiva ca /
K12mpratpru:779: pūrayed balikumbhāś ca lakṣaṇād yān sumaṅgalān //
K12mpratpru:785: evaṃ kṛte likhed vipra yad icchet siddhim ātmanaḥ //
K12mpratpru:787: paṭṭe vā vastrabhūrje vānyatra vā yatra kutracit //
K12mpratpru:788: likhet strīṣu ca putrārthī samyaggorocanena vai /
K12mpratpru:793: pravarṣaś cāpi kartavyāś catuḥ koṇeṣu parvatāḥ //
K12mpratpru:794: evaṃ likhet prayatnena yad icched jīvitaṃ sukham /
K12mpratpru:797: nānārūpāś ca kartavyā mudrācihnaś ca padminī //
K12mpratpru:798: dve padme athavā trīṇi catvāri pañca vā likhet /
K12mpratpru:799: padmānāṃ ca tathā kuryāt keśarāṇi samantataḥ //
K12mpratpru:802: parśuṃ kuryāt tathā padme atha patre samantataḥ /
K12mpratpru:803: sakhaṅgaṃ padmaṃ kurvīta tat padmaṃ śitam eva ca //
K12mpratpru:804: śaṅkhaṃ padme tathā kuryāt sarvatra vidhivistaram /
K12mpratpru:808: bhikṣuṃ vajradharaṃ kuryād duṣṭatarjanaṃ tat param /
K12mpratpru:809: caturaś ca mahārājāṃś catuḥ pārśveṣu saṃlikhet //
K12mpratpru:811: śūdreṣu ca sadā saumyaṃ cakrasvāminam ālikhet //
K12mpratpru:812: vaiśyeṣu ca vaiśramaṇam indraś caiva sureśvaraḥ /
K12mpratpru:814: syāmavarṇā bhaved yātu raudraṃ tasyā samālikhet /
K12mpratpru:817: kṛṣāyāḥ pūrṇabhadras tu mayā hy uktaṃ svayaṃbhuvā //
K12mpratpru:818: gulviṇyāś ca mahākālo likhec ca brahmadevatān /
K12mpratpru:821: dhārayet satataṃ kaṇṭhe bhadraṃ tasya bhaviṣyati //
K12mpratpru:823: padmasya keśare pāśaṃ cakraṃ cāpi tathāparam //
K12mpratpru:824: vajraṃ padme tathā likhyaṃ mudgalaṃ padmasaṃsthitam /
K12mpratpru:825: śaktiṃ likhet tathā padme yathāvidhiṣu dṛṣyate //
K12mpratpru:830: pārthivānāṃ balaṃ nityaṃ sārthavāhaṃ likhed budhaḥ /
K12mpratpru:833: likhec ca khaṇḍāṃ pāṇḍānāṃ putralābho bhaviṣyati //
K12mpratpru:837: prāpnoti paramaṃ sthānaṃ svayaṃbhū vacanaṃ yathā //
K12mpratpru:838: loke 'smin paramaṃ saukhyaṃ paraloke paraṃ sukham /
K12mpratpru:840: jambudvīpe śubhe ramye vidyāsaukhyaṃ ca nityaśaḥ /
K12mpratpru:845: buddhāś ca bodhisatvāś ca āśvāsayanti nityaśaḥ //
K12mpratpru:850: nāsau hanyati śastreṇa na viṣeṇa nāgninā /
K12mpratpru:852: darśanāt sparśanāc caiva śravaṇād eva sarvataḥ /
K12mpratpru:855: te sarve na bhaviṣyanti yeṣāṃ vidyā subhāṣitā //
K12mpratpru:856: sarvathā sarvamārais tu śṛṇu vakṣāmi tatvataḥ /
K12mpratpru:861: yatra yatra kṛtā rakṣā bhavaty abaddho na saṃśayaḥ //
K12mpratpru:865: duṣprekṣitaṃ dullikhitaṃ kākhordā ye ca dāruṇāḥ //
K12mpratpru:867: sarve tasya praśāmyanti rakṣāṃ dhāvayate tu yaḥ //
K12mpratpru:870: sarve te pralapaṃ yānti pratisarā sāpatarjitāḥ /
K12mpratpru:871: buddhā rakṣanti sarvajñā bodhisatvāś ca pūratāḥ //
K12mpratpru:873: anye ca bahuvidhā bhūyo devā nāgā mahārddhikāḥ //
K12mpratpru:874: rakṣāṃ kurvanti tasyeme cāsmin yuktasya nityaśaḥ /
K12mpratpru:876: nirbhayo bhavati sarvatra ity evaṃ munir abravīt /
K12mpratpru:877: duḥsvapnā duṣkṛtā ye ca upasargā ye ca dāruṇā //
K12mpratpru:880: itayo dāruṇā ye ca grasante mānuṣīṃ prajām /
K12mpratpru:882: sarve te pralapaṃ yānti rakṣā yatra mahābalāḥ /
K12mpratpru:886: parikṣīṇāyuṣo yas tu saptāhamṛta eva ca /
K12mpratpru:887: yāval likhitamātreṇa sa jīvati na saṃśayaḥ //
K12mpratpru:889: svasti prāpnoti sarvatra sukhaṃ jīvati cepsayā //
K12mpratpru:891: trāyastriṃśāś ca ye devā sarve śakrapurogamāḥ //
K12mpratpru:894: vidyā kulaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ rakṣāṃ kurvanti nityaśaḥ /
K12mpratpru:895: somaḥ sumatāḥ sūryaś ca brahmā viṣṇur maheśvarāḥ //
K12mpratpru:896: yamaś ca māṇibhadraś ca baladevo mahābalaḥ /
K12mpratpru:899: śrīr api ca mahādevī vaiśramaṇaḥ sarasvatī //
K12mpratpru:901: dhanyā etā mahābhāgā rakṣāṃ kurvanti nityaśaḥ //
K12mpratpru:903: rakṣeyaṃ mahatī cāsya yāvad jīvaṃ bhaviṣyati //
K12mpratpru:906: atha pāpavināśe tu likhanād eva setsyati /
K12mpratpru:908: yaśaś ca vardhate tasya puṇyam āyuś ca vardhate /
K12mpratpru:909: dhanadhānyaṃ samṛddhiś ca bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ //
K12mpratpru:910: sukhaṃ svapiti medhāvī sukhaṃ ca pratibudhyate /
K12mpratpru:914: sukhaṃ sādhayate vidyāṃ vighno 'sya na bhaviṣyati /
K12mpratpru:916: kṣipraṃ ca samayajño 'sau bhavet sarvatra jātiṣu /
K12mpratpru:917: vaisvāsikaś ca sa bhavej jinānāṃ guṇadhāraṇaiḥ //
K12mpratpru:923: nityaṃ jātismarā bhonti jātau na saṃśayaḥ //
K12mpratpru:925: sāmātyaś ca bhaven nityaṃ sādhubhir lokasamataiḥ //
K12mpratpru:926: sarveṣāṃ ca priyo bhonti ye devā ye ca mānuṣāḥ /
K12mpratpru:927: rakṣāṃ tasya kariṣyanti divā rātrau ca nityaśaḥ //
K12mpratpru:932: namo bhagavate śākyamunaye mahākāruṇikāya tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya /
K12mpratpru:938: mārāś ca mārakāyāś ca grahāḥ sarve vināyakāḥ /
K12mpratpru:939: vighnāś ca santi ye kecit tatkṣaṇād vilapaṃ gatāḥ //
K12mpratpru:940: tadyathā / oṃ giri 2 giriṇi 2 girivati guṇavati ākāśavati /
K12mpratpru:963: caṇḍi 2 vajracaṇḍe ghori gandhāri gauri caṇḍāli mātaṅgi varcasi /
K12mpratpru:971: paca 2 hṛdayaṃ vidhvaṃsaya jīvitaṃ sarvaduṣṭagrahāṇāṃ nāśaya sarvapāpāni me bhagavati /
K12mpratpru:972: rakṣa 2 māṃ saparivāraṃ sarvasatvāṃś ca sarvatra sarvadā sarvabhayopadravebhyaḥ sarvaduṣṭānāṃ bandhanaṃ kuru 2 sarvakilbiṣanāśani /
K12mpratpru:1004: rakṣa 2 māṃ sarvasthānagataṃ sarvaduṣṭabhayebhyaḥ sarvamanuṣyāmanuṣyabhayebhyaḥ sarvabhayebhyaḥ sarvavyādhibhyaḥ /
K12mpratpru:1006: hili 2 mili 2 kili 2 cili 2 sili 2 vara 2 varade /
K12mpratpru:1012: svastir bhavatu mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca svāhā /
K12mpratpru:1022: bala 2 balavati jaya vidye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā /
K12mpratpru:1024: mahāpratisare hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā //
K12mpratpru:1025: yasya kasyacit mahābrāhmaṇa anayā tathāgatamūrtyā vidyāmantrapadadhāriṇyā rakṣā kṛtā
K12mpratpru:1026: guptiḥ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiḥ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraḥ śastraparihāro
K12mpratpru:1028: tasya parīkṣīṇām āyuḥ punar eva vivardhate /
K12mpratpru:1029: suciraṃ sukhaṃ jīvati smṛtisaṃpannaś ca bhavati //
K12mpratpru:1030: uccāraṇamātreṇa vajrāvamarjanena vā akālamaraṇāt mahāvyādhibhyaś ca parimucyate /
K12mpratpru:1033: dine dine svādhyāyaṃ kuryān mahāprājño bhavati /
K12mpratpru:1035: sarvakarmāvaraṇāni cāsya niyatavedanīyāni niravaśeyaṃ parikṣayaṃ gacchanti /
K12mpratpru:1038: antaśo mahābrāhmaṇa iyaṃ mahāvidyāmantrapadarakṣā tiryagyonigatānām api mṛgapakṣiṇāṃ yeṣāṃ karṇapuṭe vipatite sarve vaivarttikā bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K12mpratpru:1039: kaḥ punar vādo ya imāṃ mahāpratisarāṃ dhāraṇīṃ śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā
K12mpratpru:1040: bhikṣur vā bhikṣuṇī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā rājā vā rājaputro vā rājāmātyo vā brāhmaṇo
K12mpratpru:1041: vā kṣatriyo vā tad anyo vā yaḥ kaścic chrokṣati śrutvā ca mahatyā śraddhayā gauraveṇādhyāśayena
K12mpratpru:1045: tasya mahābrāhmaṇāṣṭau akālamaraṇāni pratikāṃkṣitavyāni na prabhavanti /
K12mpratpru:1047: nāgnir na viṣaṃ na śastraṃ na garaṃ (Mp_32)
K12mpratpru:1048: na kākhordā na kiraṇā na mantrakarmaṇaṃ na cūrṇayogo nāṅgaśūlaṃ na śirovarti ekāhikaṃ dvaitīyakaṃ cāturthakaṃ saptāhikā vā jvālā na kramiṣyanti
K12mpratpru:1049: sa smṛta eva sukhaṃ svastinā svapiti /
K12mpratpru:1053: sa yatrayatropapadyate tatratatra jātau jātau jātismaro bhaviṣyati /
K12mpratpru:1057: yathā cārkamaṇḍalaṃ sarvasatvānāṃ tathā raśmyāvabhāsakaro bhaviṣyati /
K12mpratpru:1058: yathā candramaṇḍalam amṛtena prabhavatā sarvasatvānāṃ kāyaṃ prahradayati tathā dharmāmṛtena sarvasatvānāṃ cittasantānāni prahradayiṣyati /
K12mpratpru:1059: sarvaduṣṭayakṣarākṣasabhūtapretapiśāconmādāpasmāraḍākinīgrahavighnavināśakādayaḥ sarve 'sya mahāpratisarāyā mahāvidyāyāḥ prabhāvena na śaktā viheṭhanāṃ kartum /
K12mpratpru:1060: upasaṃkrāmatāṃ ca teṣām iyaṃ mahāvidyārājñī smartavyā /
K12mpratpru:1061: tatas te sarve duṣṭacittā vidyādharasya vaśyā ājñayā śravaṇavidheyā bhaviṣyanti /
K12mpratpru:1062: asyā evānubhāvena yad uta mahāpratisarāyā mahāvidyārājño na cāsya śatrubhayaṃ bhaviṣyati /
K12mpratpru:1065: antaśo vadhyārho 'pi vadhakapuruṣair ucchritāny api śastrāṇi khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ gacchanti pāṃśumayānīva viśīryas tataś ca samaye sarvadharmā asyābhimukhī bhaviṣyanti /
K12mpratpru:1067: rakṣoghnaṃ paramaṃ hy etat pavitraṃ pāpanāśanam /
K12mpratpru:1073: sarvakāmāṃś ca labhate buddhasya vacane yathā //
K12mpratpru:1074: patha utpatham āpannā eṣāṃ vidyām anusmaret //
K12mpratpru:1075: panthānaṃ labhate śīghraṃ bhojanaṃ pānam uttamam /
K12mpratpru:1076: karmaṇā manasā vācā yat kṛtaṃ pūrvajanmasu //
K12mpratpru:1078: smaraṇād dhāraṇāc caiva udgrahāl likhanād api //
K12mpratpru:1081: evaṃ hi dharmarase prāpte pāpā gacchanti saṃkṣayam /
K12mpratpru:1082: sidhyante sarvakarmāṇi manasā yad yad īpsitam //
K12mpratpru:1084: rājāgnir udakaṃ caiva vidyud vā taskaro 'pi vā //
K12mpratpru:1086: sarve te pralapaṃ yānti vidyāyā lakṣajāyātaḥ //
K12mpratpru:1087: vidyemāṃ paramāṃ siddhāṃ sarvabuddhair hi deśitā /
K12mpratpru:1089: sarveṣu caiva sthāneṣu imāṃ vidyāṃ prayojayet /
K12mpratpru:1092: namaḥ sarvatathāgatebhyo ye 'pi tiṣṭhanti daśasu dikṣu //
K12mpratpru:1093: oṃ maṇivajre hṛdayavaire mārasainyavidāriṇi hana 2 sarvaśatrūn rakṣa 2 mama śarīraṃ sarvasatvānāṃ ca vajre 2 vajragarbhe 2 /
K12mpratpru:1094: trāsaya 2 sarvamārabhavanāni hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā //
K12mpratpru:1099: caturaḥ pūrṇakuṃbhāṃś ca sthāpayed vidhinā budhaḥ //
K12mpratpru:1100: puṣpāṇy avakiret tatra dhūpayed dhūpam uttamam /
K12mpratpru:1103: caturas tīrikāḥ sthāpyāḥ sarvāś ca paṭṭabaddhakāḥ //
K12mpratpru:1107: saptaso japtayā cāsya rakṣāṃ kuryād vicakṣaṇaḥ //
K12mpratpru:1110: bhūyaś ca saptavārān vai varikumbhaṃ sumantritam /
K12mpratpru:1112: ity evaṃ dakṣiṇe pārśve prakṣipet sapta eva tu /
K12mpratpru:1113: paścimā yāntu saptaiva uttarāyāṃ tathā diśi //
K12mpratpru:1114: adha ūrdhvaṃ tu saptaiva kṛtā rakṣā bhaviṣyati /
K12mpratpru:1116: eṣā rakṣā mayā khyātā śākyasiṃhena bhāṣitā /
K12mpratpru:1117: nāsty asyāḥ parā kācid rakṣā vidyā tridhātuke //
K12mpratpru:1118: na tasya mṛtyur na jarā na rogo na ca priyair jātuviyogabhāvaḥ /
K12mpratpru:1119: na cāpriyais tasya hi saṃprayogo bhaved dhiyo bhāvitacittasaṃtatiḥ /
K12mpratpru:1120: yamo 'pi tasya varadharmarājā kariṣyate pūjāṃ sagauraveṇa /
K12mpratpru:1121: kathayiṣyate devasuraṃ hi gacha kṣaṇikaṃ mamedaṃ narakapurajvāriṃ kariṣyasi /
K12mpratpru:1122: tato vimānaiḥ subahuprakārarir maharddhiko yāti surālayaṃ śubham /
K12mpratpru:1123: evaṃ hy asau naramarudyakṣarākṣasaiḥ saṃpūjitas tatra sadā bhaviṣyati /
K12mpratpru:1124: vajrapāṇiś ca yakṣendra indra caiva śacīpatiḥ /
K12mpratpru:1127: te ca sarve mahānāgā devatā ṛṣayas tathā //
K12mpratpru:1128: asurā garuḍā gandharvāḥ kinnarāś ca mahoragāḥ /
K12mpratpru:1130: likhitāṃ dhārayet prājño bāhau baddhvā maharddhikāḥ /
K12mpratpru:1131: mahatīṃ labhate pūjāṃ saṃpadaṃ cāpi nityaśa iti //
